              <inclusiveGateway id='inclusivegateway1'>
                <branch condition='ASA selected' id='branch5-1-1'>
                  <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Start ASA 160 mg loading dose, then enteric coated ASA (81–325 mg) daily (maintenance dose 81 mg/day for most)' objects='patient, ASA' id='activity22'/>
                </branch>
                <branch condition='Clopidogrel selected' id='branch5-1-2'>
                  <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Start clopidogrel 300 mg loading dose, then 75 mg/day' objects='patient, clopidogrel' id='activity23'/>
                </branch>
                <branch condition='Extended-release dipyridamole/ASA selected' id='branch5-1-3'>
                  <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Start extended-release dipyridamole 200 mg/ASA 25 mg bid (load with ASA 160 mg first)' objects='patient, dipyridamole, ASA' id='activity24'/>
                </branch>
              </inclusiveGateway>
            </branch>
            <branch condition='Patient already on antiplatelet agent or contraindication present' id='branch5-2'>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Continue or adjust antiplatelet therapy as clinically indicated' objects='patient, medication history' id='activity25'/>
            </branch>
          </exclusiveGateway>
          <exclusiveGateway id='exclusivegateway7'>
            <branch condition='Patient fails swallowing screening' id='branch6-1'>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Offer rectal or gastric ASA as necessary' objects='patient, rectal/gastric ASA' id='activity26'/>
            </branch>
            <branch condition='Patient passes swallowing screening' id='branch6-2'>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Administer oral antiplatelet therapy as indicated' objects='patient, oral medication' id='activity27'/>
            </branch>
          </exclusiveGateway>
          <exclusiveGateway id='exclusivegateway4'>
            <branch condition='Immediate access to specialized TIA/minor stroke clinic' id='branch3-1-1'>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Provide immediate care at specialized TIA/minor stroke clinic' objects='patient, clinic resources' id='activity14'/>
            </branch>
            <branch condition='Delay to specialized clinic poses risk' id='branch3-1-2'>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Perform evaluation in ED' objects='patient, ED resources' id='activity15-1'/>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Consider inpatient evaluation/management for stroke prevention' objects='patient, inpatient protocol' id='activity15-2'/>
            </branch>
            <branch condition='Medical attention sought after 48 hours from symptom onset' id='branch3-1-3'>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Refer for evaluation at specialized TIA/minor stroke clinic or outpatient clinic with stroke-prevention services within 24 hours of initial presentation' objects='patient, referral' id='activity16'/>
            </branch>
          </exclusiveGateway>
        </branch>
        <branch condition='TIA without high-risk features' id='branch3-2'>
          <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Order brain CT scan' objects='patient, CT scanner' id='activity17-1'/>
          <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Review CT results and confirm no intracranial hemorrhage' objects='patient, CT results' id='activity17-2'/>
          <exclusiveGateway id='exclusivegateway6b'>
            <branch condition='Patient not on antiplatelet agent at presentation and brain imaging excludes intracranial hemorrhage' id='branch5b-1'>
              <inclusiveGateway id='inclusivegateway1b'>
                <branch condition='ASA selected' id='branch5b-1-1'>
                  <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Start ASA 160 mg loading dose, then enteric coated ASA (81–325 mg) daily (maintenance dose 81 mg/day for most)' objects='patient, ASA' id='activity22b'/>
                </branch>
                <branch condition='Clopidogrel selected' id='branch5b-1-2'>
                  <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Start clopidogrel 300 mg loading dose, then 75 mg/day' objects='patient, clopidogrel' id='activity23b'/>
                </branch>
                <branch condition='Extended-release dipyridamole/ASA selected' id='branch5b-1-3'>
                  <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Start extended-release dipyridamole 200 mg/ASA 25 mg bid (load with ASA 160 mg first)' objects='patient, dipyridamole, ASA' id='activity24b'/>
                </branch>
              </inclusiveGateway>
            </branch>
            <branch condition='Patient already on antiplatelet agent or contraindication present' id='branch5b-2'>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Continue or adjust antiplatelet therapy as clinically indicated' objects='patient, medication history' id='activity25b'/>
            </branch>
          </exclusiveGateway>
          <exclusiveGateway id='exclusivegateway7b'>
            <branch condition='Patient fails swallowing screening' id='branch6b-1'>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Offer rectal or gastric ASA as necessary' objects='patient, rectal/gastric ASA' id='activity26b'/>
            </branch>
            <branch condition='Patient passes swallowing screening' id='branch6b-2'>
              <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Administer oral antiplatelet therapy as indicated' objects='patient, oral medication' id='activity27b'/>
            </branch>
          </exclusiveGateway>
          <activity role='ED medical staff' action='Refer to outpatient clinic with stroke-prevention services for comprehensive evaluation and management within 1 month of symptom onset' objects='patient, referral' id='activity18'/>
        </branch>
      </exclusiveGateway>
    </branch>
  </exclusiveGateway>
</process>
)</API>
